com.ctriposs.bigmap.page
类 MappedPageFactoryImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.ctriposs.bigmap.page.MappedPageFactoryImpl
所有已实现的接口：
IMappedPageFactory
public class MappedPageFactoryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMappedPageFactory

Mapped mapped page resource manager, responsible for the creation, cache the mapped pages.
